Xbee and sonar working! 07 Oct 2009

I got my attiny2313 mcu talking to the computer using a pair of xbee transceivers. I also got my sonar rangefinder interfaced with the mcu so I'm able to send range data to the pc!!! See videos and pics below.


Here's a video demonstrating the sonar data coming over the xbee data link:




Here's a video just demonstrating the xbee serial data link:









Some text sent from the GCS to the mcu
